titles.title: Taxpayer Economic Hardship Protection Act of 2015
To strengthen the protections from levy by the Internal Revenue Service for taxpayers in economic hardship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
4/22/2015--Introduced. Taxpayer Economic Hardship Protection Act of 2015
This bill requires the Internal Revenue Service to take certain actions to protect taxpayers in economic hardship from a tax levy, including the adoption of procedures and guidelines that consider the possibility that a taxpayer is in economic hardship before issuing a levy.
